com.cloudera.gertrude.condition

Class AbstractPropertyCondition<V,S extends ExperimentState>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.gertrude.condition.AbstractPropertyCondition<V,S>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Condition<S>

    public abstract class AbstractPropertyCondition<V,S extends ExperimentState>
extends Object
implements Condition<S>
    A base class for the common Condition pattern of checking whether or not the value of a field in an ExperimentState belongs to a given set of values.

    For example, the property might be the country that a request originated in, and the arguments to the function would be a list of country codes. If the country returned by the #getValue method is in the given list of country codes, then the #evaluate method would return true.
